title: VISUAL SELF HYPNOSIS FOR FIRE ENERGY / Tutorial
description:
This self hypnosis practice develops FIRE ENERGY.  Fire energy is the energy of activity and enthusiasm. Practice it daily and you will go past procrastination and toward more and more activity, assertivity and personal power. It was born from an ancient tradition. Dr. Paret did intense researches on symbolic techniques connected to hypnotic techniques. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
